bt.torrent.maker

Class TorrentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.torrent.maker.TorrentBuilder

  • public class TorrentBuilder
extends Object
    A builder pattern to make torrent files conforming to BEP-003

        public TorrentBuilder privateFlag(boolean isPrivate)
        Set whether this torrent is a private torrent. See BEP-0027
        Parameters:
        isPrivate - whether the torrent should be marked as private

      • getMaxNumOpenFiles

        public int getMaxNumOpenFiles()
        maxNumOpenFiles(int)

      • maxNumOpenFiles

        public TorrentBuilder maxNumOpenFiles(int maxNumOpenFiles)
        Set the max number of open files during torrent creation. This is useful if you are creating a torrent which contains many different files and you want to minimize opening the same file when computing hashes while not exceeding the open file descriptor limit
        Parameters:
        maxNumOpenFiles - the max number of files that will be opened concurrently during torrent creation.

      • getNumHashingThreads

        public int getNumHashingThreads()

      • numHashingThreads

        public TorrentBuilder numHashingThreads(int numHashingThreads)
        Set the number of threads used to create sha1 hashes for the torrent being created any value less than 1 will use Java's common fork join pool. ForkJoinPool.commonPool()
        Parameters:
        numHashingThreads - the number of threads used to create hashes
        Returns:
        the torrent builder

      • addAnnounceGroup

        public TorrentBuilder addAnnounceGroup(Collection<String> announceGroup)

        Get the digest buffer size
        Returns:
        the size of the digest buffer

      • hashingBufferSize

        public TorrentBuilder hashingBufferSize(int hashingBufferSize)
        Set the size of the io buffer used for reading from files to verify their digest.
        Parameters:
        hashingBufferSize - the size of the digest buffer

      • build

        public byte[] build()
        Build the torrent
        Returns:
